page.title: 09Religion and The Church.
page.content:
There is a church and a chapel in Beckington. { The Church}has a Norman four decker tower. It is a fine building and contains several famous brasses. Services are held every Sunday. On the first Suday of the month at 10.30 am there is a family service taken by groups like the Brownies, cubs and guides.
Beckington school took the service on 7th July. The doctor played the organ and the guitar We sang lots of hymns from our new hymn book and we taught them to the congregation. They liked them. We made up some prayers and did the readings. I read a prayer and did the collection. Afterwards we had coffee and orange squash in the church Lots of people come to the family services.
